Comment.value:
This is a waypoint that can be placed in an interior area to mark it as a home. This will affect the animations and behavior of NPCs that spawn inside this area that are using the PlayAmbientAnimations functions (see the OnSpawn script nw_c2_default9 and the library x0_i0_anims for details). 

Note that this feature will only work in modules that use the XP1 modified AI.
